UserInputTitle.title: User Input Title
UserInputTitle.description: Title for the UserInput mechanism. Version 1.3+

CreateAdminIfGroupMember.title: Group Membership to Create Admin Users
CreateAdminIfGroupMember.description: List of groups that should have its members created as local administrators. Version: 1.2+

SecureTokenManagementEnableOnlyAdminUser.title: Enable Only Admin User
SecureTokenManagementEnableOnlyAdminUser.description: If enabled, the SecureToken service account will only enable administrative users created with NoMAD Login. Version: 1.4+

UserInputMainText.title: User Input Main Text
UserInputMainText.description: Text for the UserInput mechanism. Version: 1.3+

NotifyLogStyle.title: Add Notify to management Log File
NotifyLogStyle.description: Adds the appropriate log file to the the Notify mechanism. (None, Jamf, FileWave, Munki). Version: 1.3+

DenyLocal.title: Deny Local Users
DenyLocal.description: Determines if local user accounts are allowed to sign in, or if all auth is forced through AD. Version: 1.3+

IgnoreSites.title: Ignore Sites
IgnoreSites.description: Ignore sites in AD. This is a compatibility measure for AD installs that have issues with sites. Version: 1.3+

EULATitle.title: End User License Agreement Title
EULATitle.description: Text for the large title in the EULA window. Version: 1.2+

MigrateUsersHide.title: Hidden Migration User
MigrateUsersHide.description: List of names of users that should be hidden from user migration candidates during selection. Version: 1.4+

DemobilizeSaveAltSecurityIdentities.title: Demobilize Preserve All Security Identities
DemobilizeSaveAltSecurityIdentities.description: If true, the AltSecurityIdentities user record attribute should be preserved, useful when moving from mobile accounts with smart card mapping implemented. Version: 1.4+

BackgroundImage.title: Login Window Background Image
BackgroundImage.description: Path to the background image to be used. Version: 1.1.0+

PasswordOverwriteSilent.title: Password Overwrite Silent
PasswordOverwriteSilent.description: When DenyLocal and PasswordOverwriteSilent are enabled and the user does not have a secure token NoLo will force overwrite the users password to the new password. Version: 1.4+

UsernameFieldPlaceholder.title: Username Field Placeholder
UsernameFieldPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text to show in the username textfield. Version: 1.2+

KeychainCreate.title: Create Keychain
KeychainCreate.description: Create keychain if it does not exist. Version: 1.2+

CreateAdminUser.title: Create Admin Users
CreateAdminUser.description: Will place any local user created at login by NoMAD Login in the local admin. Version: 1.0+

LocalFallback.title: Local Fallback
LocalFallback.description: When enabled, login fallbacks to local auth if the network is not available. Version: 1.3+

DemobilizeForcePasswordCheck.title: Demobilize Force Password Check
DemobilizeForcePasswordCheck.description: If true, a password input at the NoMAD login window will be required to demobilize. Version: 1.4+

EnableFDE.title: Enable FileVault on APFS
EnableFDE.description: On systems using the APFS filesystem, this key will enable FileVault encryption as the user is signing in for the first time. Version: 1.0+

UserProfileImage.title: User Profile Image
UserProfileImage.description: Path to an image to set as the user profile image. Version: 1.2+

AliasUPN.title: Alias User Principal Name
AliasUPN.description: If enabled, the user's UserPrincipalName is added as an alias to the local account during account creation. Version: 1.4+

UIDTool.title: UID Tool
UIDTool.description: String to determine the path of an executable that is run when a new user is created. It is expected to return the UID that the user should be created with. It passes in the new users username as the first argument, default is to use the built in functionality. Version: 1.4+

DenyLocalExcluded.title: Deny Local User Exclusions
DenyLocalExcluded.description: List of local user shortnames that will be allowed to authenticate locally instead of via AD. Version 1.3+

AdditionalADDomainList.title: Domain Dropdown List
AdditionalADDomainList.description: List of LDAP servers to display in the pulldown menu in the Login Window. Users can select a domain from the menu and then only enter the shortname in the text field. Version: 1.4+

UserInputLogo.title: User Input Logo
UserInputLogo.description: Path to a logo file to use for the UserInput mechanism. Version: 1.3+

DefaultSystemInformation.title: Default System Information
DefaultSystemInformation.description: Defines which system information should be showed on login window, by default. (None, Serial, MAC, Hostname, ComputerName, SystemVersion, IP) Version: 1.4+

AliasNTName.title: Alias NT Name
AliasNTName.description: If enabled, the user's NT style name is added as an alias to the local account during account creation. Version: 1.4+

PasswordOverwriteOptional.title: Password Overwrite Optional
PasswordOverwriteOptional.description: When DenyLocal and PasswordOverwriteOptional are enabled and the user does not have a secure token NoLo will prompt the user overwrite the users password to the new password. Version: 1.4+

LoginScreen.title: macOS Style Login Window
LoginScreen.description: If set to yes, a macOS-style loginscreen will be presented instead of the NoMAD Login loginwindow style. Version: 1.1.0+

EULAPath.title: End User License Agreement Save Path
EULAPath.description: Path to save acceptance records to. Example: /var/db/NoMADLogin/. Version: 1.2+

AdditionalADDomains.title: Additional Active Directory Domains
AdditionalADDomains.description: List of domains to append at the loginwindow. If not set, the standard Managed Domain policy will apply. Version: 1.2+

SecureTokenManagementOnlyEnableFirstUser.title: Only Enable First User
SecureTokenManagementOnlyEnableFirstUser.description: If enabled, NoMAD Login will only enable the first user that is eligable for a SecureToken, and delete the service account afterwards. Version: 1.4+

SecureTokenManagementPasswordLength.title: Service Account Password Length
SecureTokenManagementPasswordLength.description: Defines a custom SecureToken service account password length. Version: 1.4+

SecureTokenManagementIconPath.title: Secure Token Icon Path
SecureTokenManagementIconPath.description: Path of the icon to be used for the user. Exampe: /Library/Security/SecurityAgentPlugins/NoMADLoginAD.bundle/Contents/Resources/NoMADFDEIcon.png

SecureTokenManagementFullName.title: Service Account Full Name
SecureTokenManagementFullName.description: Defines a custom Full Name for the SecureToken service account. Example: NoMad Login. Version: 1.4+

LoginLogoAlpha.title: LoginLogoAlpha
LoginLogoAlpha.description: Alpha value of the logo image. Version: 1.3+

LDAPServers.title: LDAP Servers
LDAPServers.description: List of LDAP servers that you would like to use for AD authentication instead of using SRV record lookup. Version 1.3+

EULAText.title: End User License Agreement
EULAText.description: Text to present in the EULA window. Version: 1.2+

UseCNForFullNameFallback.title: Use User Common Name for Full Name Fallback
UseCNForFullNameFallback.description: Uses the CN as the fullname on the account when the givenName and sn fields are blank. Version: 1.4+

BackgroundImageAlpha.title: Login Window Background Image Alpha
BackgroundImageAlpha.description: Alpha value of the background image. Version: 1.3+

ScriptPath.title: Script Path
ScriptPath.description: Path to the script or other executable.

LastUser.title: Last User Shortname
LastUser.description: Shortname of the last user to login. This allows NoMAD to login on first launch. Version: 1.2.1+ NOTE: Setting this in a profile will disable this value from being set on the system.

MessagePasswordSync.title: Password Sync Message
MessagePasswordSync.description: Message to show when the password needs to sync. Version: 1.4+

EnableFDERecoveryKeyPath.title: FileVault Recovery Key Path
EnableFDERecoveryKeyPath.description: String of a folder path where the recovery key will be stored. NoLo will create this folder if it does not already exist. Version: 1.3+

ScriptArgs.title: Script Arguments
ScriptArgs.description: Arguments to be used with the script. <<User>> will be replaced with the current user's shortname, <<First>> with the current user's first name, <<Last>> with the current user's last name, <<Principal>> with the current user's Kerberos principal.

LoginLogo.title: Login Logo
LoginLogo.description: Path to the logo to display on the login screen. If set to NONE, no logo will be shown. Version: 1.1.0+

KeychainReset.title: Reset Keychain if Password Doesn't Match
KeychainReset.description: Reset keychain if login password doesn't match. Version: 1.2+

GUIDTool.title: GUID Tool
GUIDTool.description: String to determine the path of an executable that is run when a new user is created. It is expected to return the GUID that the user should be created with. It passes in the new users username as the first argument, default is to use the built in functionality. Version: 1.4+

ManageSecureTokens.title: Enable Secure Token Management
ManageSecureTokens.description: This key will enable SecureToken management capabilites in NomadLogin 1.4. This utilizes a service account which can be modified from default using the below optional preferences. Version: 1.4+

RecursiveGroupLookup.title: Recursive Group Lookup
RecursiveGroupLookup.description: If set to yes, group membership lookups should be done recursively. Version: 1.4+

SecureTokenManagementPasswordLocation.title: Service Account Password Storage Path
SecureTokenManagementPasswordLocation.description: Defines a custom password storage location for the SecureToken service account password. Example‚Äù /var/db/.nomadLoginSecureTolkenPassword. Version: 1.4+

SecureTokenManagementUsername.title: Service Account User Name
SecureTokenManagementUsername.description: Defines a a custom username for the SecureToken service account. Example: _nomadlogin. Version: 1.4+

SecureTokenManagementUID.title: Service Account UID
SecureTokenManagementUID.description: Defines a custom UID for the SecureToken service account. Example: 400. Version: 1.4+

DenyLoginUnlessGroupMember.title: Allowed Group Membership User Logins
DenyLoginUnlessGroupMember.description: List of AD group names. When an AD user is authenticating, only allow login if the user is a member of one of these groups. Version: 1.3+

UserInputOutputPath.title: User Input / Output Path
UserInputOutputPath.description: Path where the userinfo.plist will be written. Version: 1.3+

UseCNForFullName.title: Use User Common Name for Full Name
UseCNForFullName.description: Use the the user's CN from AD instead of attempting to create the user name from the first and last name attributes of the user's AD record. Version: 1.3+

LDAPOverSSL.title: LDAP Over SSL
LDAPOverSSL.description: Determines if NoMAD Login uses LDAP over SSL. Version: 1.0+

GuestUserAccountPasswordPath.title: Guest User Account Password Path
GuestUserAccountPasswordPath.description: The path to write out the guest users randomly generated password. Version: 1.4+

EULASubTitle.title: End User License Agreement Subtitle
EULASubTitle.description: Text for a subtitle in the EULA window. Version: 1.2+

GuestUserLast.title: Guest User Last Name
GuestUserLast.description: Defines the last name of the guest user account. Version: 1.4+

CustomNoMADLocation.title: Custom NoMAD Location
CustomNoMADLocation.description: If defined it specifies the custom location of the application to be given access to the keychain item. Version: 1.4+

GuestUserFirst.title: Guest User First Name
GuestUserFirst.description: Defines the first name of the guest user account. Version: 1.4+

EnableFDERekey.title: FileVault Personal Recovery Key Rotation
EnableFDERekey.description: Determines if the FileVault personal recovery key should be rotated when a valid FileVault user signs in. Version: 1.3+

DemobilizeUsers.title: Demobilize Users
DemobilizeUsers.description: Will convert a previously cached mobile account from AD into a regular local user account on login. Version: 1.0+

GuestUserAccounts.title: Guest User Accounts
GuestUserAccounts.description: List of names that can be entered into the username field to trigger a guest user creation. Version: 1.4+

PowerControlDisabled.title: Hide Shutdown and Restart
PowerControlDisabled.description: If set to yes, hides the shutdown and restart buttons. Version: 1.3.1+

KeychainAddNoMAD.title: Add NoMAD to Keychain
KeychainAddNoMAD.description: Add a NoMAD entry into the keychain. Version: 1.2+

AllowNetworkSelection.title: Show Network Selection
AllowNetworkSelection.description: If enabled, the network selection button is shown. Version: 1.4+
